title: PHPftp_raw()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPftp_raw()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
Example
content_sections.code:
<?php
// connect to FTP server
$ftp_server = "ftp.example.com";
$ftp_conn = ftp_connect($ftp_server) or die("Could not connect to $ftp_server");
// the two lines below is the same as: ftp_login($ftp_conn,"john","secretpassword");
ftp_raw($ftp_conn, "USER john");
ftp_raw($ftp_conn, "PASS secretpassword");
?>

practice_exercises.solution:
<?php
// connect to FTP server
$ftp_server = "ftp.example.com";
$ftp_conn = ftp_connect($ftp_server) or die("Could not connect to $ftp_server");
// the two lines below is the same as: ftp_login($ftp_conn,"john","secretpassword");
ftp_raw($ftp_conn, "USER john");
ftp_raw($ftp_conn, "PASS secretpassword");
?>

summary: This tutorial covers PHPftp_raw()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use PHPftp_raw()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of PHPftp_raw()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
